subject: Verify your domain for Vetchium Employer Portal
body_intro: Thank you for signing up for Vetchium Employer Portal! To verify your domain ownership, please add the following DNS TXT record.
body_dns_instructions: Add a TXT record to your DNS settings for {{.Domain}} with the values shown below.
step1: Log in to your domain registrar or DNS provider (e.g., GoDaddy, Cloudflare, Namecheap, Route 53)
step2: Navigate to the DNS management or DNS records section for your domain
step3: Add a new TXT record with the Host/Name and Value provided below
step4: Save the DNS record and wait for propagation (usually 5-30 minutes, but can take up to 48 hours)
step5: Return to Vetchium and click 'Complete Signup' to verify your domain
propagation_note: DNS changes can take anywhere from a few minutes to 48 hours to propagate. If verification fails, please wait and try again later.
body_expiry: This verification token will expire in {{.Hours}} hours.
body_ignore: If you didn't request this signup, please ignore this email.
footer: This is an automated message, please do not reply.
